item.title: Flask Series: Jsonify
item.description: Flask jsonify, do I still need it? For a long time, returning JSON in flask required using the flask.jsonify API. However, since this PR Flask will by default call jsonify under the hood on any dictionary it receives on a make_response call. How does it work When you need to return json in a response, you can simply use a plain python dictionary instead of the jsonify API. # plain dictionary @app.
